document_data.caption: A sailor relaxes in Oparil's Tower.
document_data.name: Oparil's Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Oparil's Tower''' was a dusty [[inn]] found in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: Oparil's Tower sat in the south section of Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]] on [[Barge Street]].
document_data.Description: The "tower" of Oparil's Tower rose several stories above the surrounding buildings in the Harbor District. The interior of the inn was decorated with tapestries collected throughout [[Faer√ªn]]. The inn rented twenty rooms and had a bathhouse for use.
document_data.Activities: Though lacking in luxurious amenities, Oparil's Tower was still more than comfortable while remaining moderately priced. The owner of Oparil's Tower ensured that the best singers and performers to be found within Zhentil Keep were hired to perform within the inn.
document_data.Inhabitants: The inn was owned by aging [[bard]] named [[Oparil]].
